long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Making UR's shuttle schedules more accessible.

Get the most relevant information from UR Shuttle schedules with the least amount of work!

No longer you have to find when the next bus would arrive at your stop by looking at a giant table. Click the colored-label for your bus schedule, and see the next arrival time and future arrival times for all stops right away!
